title: Mobile-Based Formative Assessment and Feedback Improvement Process Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone app usage skills, project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Need to establish an assessment system utilizing social media and mobile apps in a limited technological environment focused on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can review real-time formative assessment results via mobile devices and incorporate feedback.
Learners can operate a peer evaluation and feedback exchange system on social media platforms.
Learners can analyze feedback at each project stage and establish self-directed learning strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
